snippet.title: Implementing the Essentials | Devlog 5
snippet.description:
Hi everyone, and welcome back! I know it's been slightly over "a month", but today I'll be covering how I went about implementing the essential mechanics of my game - the main menu, settings, and saving and loading of worlds. My game has now also been officially named and so I'll show the title art that I drew for it. Be sure to stay tuned for the demo which will be coming out soon, but most importantly, enjoy! 😊


💬 Join my discord server here!
https://discord.com/invite/NxDSW65sUY

🙋‍♂️ Support the channel by subscribing!
https://www.youtube.com/@sigmoiddev

🎬 Check out the rest of the devlogs!
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdCLXFnLGVkAp9dh9vQI5v0Pg78-CMXMy


📖 Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:43 - Saving & Loading
2:07 - Designing the Main Menu
2:47 - World Selection & Creation
3:49 - Settings & Keybinds
4:29 - Name Announcement
5:06 - Release Info & Outro


🎶 Music:
massobeats - swing | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gw2ANm5Uym8
massobeats - familiar places | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0NqWjmUl4Q
Tokyo Music Walker - Slowly | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=812MxdGfsVE
 

🔗 Credits:
All Icons by Freepik on FlatIcon https://www.flaticon.com/
All Gifs from Tenor https://www.tenor.com 
All Stock Images from Pexels https://www.pexels.com/


📱Software:
Recording: OBS Studio 🎥
Editing: CapCut 🎬
Engine: Unity 🕹️
IDE: Visual Studio Code 💻
Theme: Rainglow - Rainbow 🌈
Pixel Art: Aseprite 🖼️
Planning: Milanote 🗒️
